amendment.description: At the end of division D (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this division (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 2.1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to reduce the amount of funding provided by Division D by 2.1 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 334).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A084) offered by Mr. Grothman.
